name: City-Ship: Mercury
description:
Story:

As a monk of The Order of Signos, trained in deadly combat, you have been instructed to investigate strange goings-on in City-Ship: Mercury. Battle you way through the massive vessel to learn what has happened to the crew.

Controls:

Movement:  Arrow keys or Numpad (don't forget to enable Num Lock for numpad)

- move into enemies to melee them

Pickup:  g

Inventory:  i

- use letter keys to use/equip items

Drop from inventory:  d

- use letter keys to select item to drop

Use stairs:  Enter or .

Character stats:  c

Back/quit:  Esc

Fullscreen:  Left-alt and Enter
